title: Citi Hungary's Commercial Banking Clients Can Now Monitor Information on Their Partners Through the Free Citi-Opten PartnerWatch Service
summary: Budapest, Hungary - Citi's Commercial Banking clients in Hungary can now quickly and easily monitor financial and liquidity related information on up to 300 of their partner companies on the free online Citi-Opten PartnerWatch Service.
tag-1: Citi Hungary's Commercial Banking Clients Can Now Monitor Information on Their Partners Through the Free Citi-Opten PartnerWatch Service
tag-2: Budapest, Hungary – Citi's Commercial Banking clients in Hungary can now quickly and easily monitor financial and liquidity related information on up to 300 of their partner companies on the free online Citi-Opten PartnerWatch Service.
tag-3: Aftab Ahmed, Citi Country Officer for Hungary, said, "In today's rapidly changing market environment, companies increasingly need reliable information about their business partners. Our aim with designing this innovative service is to help our clients get that information in a fast and easy to manage way."
tag-4: "We know from experience that delinquent customers may seriously impact the liquidity of our clients and any continuity issues with a vendor or supplier can pose risks on their ability to transact business. With this new service, we are supporting our clients in accessing up-to-date background information on their business partners that can help them avoid establishing or maintaining a potentially high risk business relationship, or make timely decisions to address the challenges," added Istvan Szabo, Head of Citi Commercial Bank in Hungary.
tag-5: Clients using the free PartnerWatch service have access to information on a single online platform for up to 300 of their business partners - customers and vendors performing transactions linked to their Citi account - from the perspective of any possible legal proceedings taken against them, including:
tag-6: More information about Citi Hungary's products and services are available at www.citibank.hu.
tag-7: Clients ordering this service will get an automatic email message on a weekly basis about the number of their monitored partners facing any legal proceedings, after which they can access the www.opten.hu website with their credentials for the details based on officially posted information in the Companies' Gazette. The Citi-Opten PartnerWatch basic service is provided by Opten Kft.
